options.command: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json

until [ -f ../api/dist/openapi.json ]; do echo 'Waiting for openapi.json...'; sleep 1; done; rm -rf src/openapi && mkdir src/openapi && openapi --input ../api/dist/openapi.json --output src/openapi --name API --useOptions --useUnionTypes && ../../node_modules/.bin/prettier src/openapi --write && npx fix-esm-import-path ./src/openapi
